topic.title: 社会史观察条目 - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF-0031)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF-0032)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF-0034), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: EHRDATASET_OID 城乡居民健康档案基本数据集) (CONF-0034)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF-0031)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF-0032)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF-0034), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: EHRDATASET_OID 城乡居民健康档案基本数据集) (CONF-0034)
